0500.name: NOT_INITIALIZED
0500.message:

0500.short_description: Internet connection settings have not been set up.
0500.long_description: (UNKNOWN CONNECTION) Internet connection settings have not been set up.
0500.short_solution: Set up a connection in internet connection settings and try again.
0500.long_solution: Go to System Settings then Internet Settings and set up a connection.
